Mia Sarine jewels are classic, timeless and traditional masterpieces that have been hand crafted to give the perfect amount of bling to your outfit. Fashionable to wear everyday, yet stylish enough for special occasions. The best way to care for your jewelry is to make sure it is the last thing you put on and first thing you take off. Avoid exposing it to chemicals, like chlorine, strong detergents and ammonia that could damage the finish. If you need to clean your jewelry, a simple soak in warm water and a light brushing with a very soft toothbrush and a gentle wipe with a soft cloth should do the trick. Never sleep or work out in your jewelry. Avoid sonic jewelry cleaners as this can loosen stones set in soft metals.
